today_in_history_posts.title: BIP 174 thoughts
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Matejcik critiques a Bitcoin proposal, focusing on selection from duplicate keys and security.
- Proposed solutions include rejecting conflicting PSBTs and a clear strategy for unknown fields.
- Minor suggestions involve explicit field definitions and revising the "Combiner" section's wording.

today_in_history_posts.title: Rebalancing argument
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Dmytro Piatkivskyi, an academic outside Lightning network development, critiques cycle transactions for rebalancing.
- Debates exist on rebalancing benefits, with suggestions like Revive and Liquidity Network amid skepticism.
- Rebalancing's impact on liquidity and network efficiency is questioned, despite proposals for smart fee strategies.

today_in_history_posts.title: bLIP: BOLT 11 Invoice Blinded Path Tagged Field
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- The proposal introduces a new bLIP for enhancing lightning payment privacy and reliability via a tagged field.
- It details technical specifications for the feature and strategies for backward compatibility and transition.
- Open feedback is sought on optimizing invoice structure and ensuring security in the signing process.
